name: Ventum Air Flight Academy
about: Ventum Air Flight Academy, located at Warsaw-Babice Airport in Poland, is a medium-sized Approved Training Organisation (ATO) dedicated to providing top-notch flight training. We offer a comprehensive range of courses from Private Pilot License (PPL) to Airline Transport Pilot License (ATPL), including Commercial Pilot License (CPL), Instrument Rating (IR), and Multi-Engine Pilot (MEP) training. Our experienced instructors, many with airline backgrounds, ensure personalized and efficient training programs. With modern aircraft featuring full glass cockpits, we cater to both local and international students. Our flexible and effective training approach has earned us a reputation for quick and successful certifications, often completed within 8-12 weeks. At Ventum Air, we are committed to guiding aspiring aviators every step of the way to launch their aviation careers.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License
Airline Transport Pilot
Multi-Pilot License (MPL)
Flight Instructor (CFI / FI)
Flight Instructor - Instrument (CFII / IRI)
Flight Instructor - Multi-Engine (MEI)
Jet Orientation Course (JOT)
Instrument Rating (IR)
Multi-Engine Rating
Night Rating
EASA ATPL Ground School
EASA ATPL Ab Initio"]
